name: Boden Game Camp - Charity Game Jam Collection
name_original: Boden Game Camp - Charity Game Jam Collection
description:
A collection of five games made in 36 hours as a part of a game jam that pulled in over 32 000kr for a swedish charity event called Musikhjälpen2022.

The theme of the gam jam was: "Make Love, Not War"

The games are free to download, but if you are seeing this while Musikhjälpen is still going on (ends on Sunday the 18th at 20:00 CET) please donate to Boden Game Camp Charity Box

https://bossan.musikhjalpen.se/boden-game-camp-charity-box

"Two Peace In a Pod"

Created by:  Erik Torenstam and Oscar "Åke" Jakobsson 

Project lead: Erik and Åke

Game Design: Erik and Åke

Level Design: Erik and Åke

Programming: Erik

Art: Åke

SFX/VFX (Not implemented): Åke

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Van Vs Giant"

SFX: Zapsplat.com

Music: Isak Dalberg

Created by: Isak Dalberg from the MBP team

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"LodeCraft"

Created by Johan Rosenberg

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"A Hole In the Wall"

Music: It-Alien

Game Design: Marve Gomes & Sergiusz Stein

Programming: Sergiusz Stein

Art and Assets: Marve Gomes

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Love Thunder"

Art & Images: Tristan Berglund

Coding & Implementation: Linus Lindblad

Narrative: Máté Mrsan
